name: Tantei Jinguuji Saburou DS: Akai Chou
summary: The fourth entry in the Jake Hunter/Tantei Jinguuji Saburo franchise that revolves around a series of political bombings that occurred 20 years ago and current bombings that are targeting lawmakers. Saburo is charged with the task of uncovering the identify of the terrorist responsible for the bombings named “Red Butterfly”!
